mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_ID AS noticeId, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY CREATED_DATE DESC) AS BNO, NOTICE_TITLE AS noticeTitle, NOTICE_CONTENT AS noticeContent, WRITER_ID AS writerId, CREATED_ID AS createdId, CREATED_DATE AS createdDate, UPDATED_ID AS updatedId, UPDATED_DATE AS updatedDate FROM TB_NOTICE ORDER BY CREATED_DATE DESC

SELECT NOTICE_ID AS noticeId, NOTICE_TITLE AS noticeTitle, NOTICE_CONTENT AS noticeContent, WRITER_ID AS writerId, CREATED_ID AS createdId, CREATED_DATE AS createdDate, UPDATED_ID AS updatedId, UPDATED_DATE AS updatedDate FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_NOTICE ( NOTICE_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, WRITER_ID, CREATED_ID, CREATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{noticeId}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{writerId}, #{createdId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = #{noticeTitle}, NOTICE_CONTENT = #{noticeContent}, UPDATED_ID = #{updatedId}, UPDATED_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId}
